3: Inside the shell of the guard is a Forsaken pendant, the string that holds it already snapped.
...Few have entered this place by only taking down a dozen of my guards.
Relax. I am only here because you got me curious.
Enough with your tricks. Show your face if you want to talk!
You misunderstood. You are not worthy to talk to me.
From how you react to that pendant, I can tell you are no threat.
And you might not be finding what you are looking for. Am I right?
Your chances too low. Your clues too few.
Oh, by the way—please continue this assassination technique of yours. I must take a closer look at it once I am done with what I am doing. It may... come in handy.
Watanabe stares at the mechanoid head for a while before realizing that whoever has been talking is long gone.
What the hell... What kind of trick is that...
(Clutches the pendant) Whatever. I'm running out of time...
